sentence.text: The purpose of the present study was to evaluate the expression of Lin28A, let-7a, and negative regulation of transcription by RNA polymerase II in human papillary thyroid carcinoma (PTC) and to investigate their potential mechanisms in the progression of PTC.

entity.text: negative regulation of transcription by RNA polymerase II

sentence.text: BACKGROUND miRNA catabolic process is a gene involved in many biological processes, including development, glucose metabolism, and tumorigenesis.
